entry.string: You must enable cookies on your browser to run Xaraya. Check the browser configuration options to make sure cookies are enabled, click on the "Back" button of the browser and try again.
entry.translation: Du skal aktivere cookies i din browser for at køre Xaraya. Tjek browerens indstillinger for at sikre dig, at cookies er aktiverede, klik på "Tilbage"-knappen og prøv igen.

entry.string: Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
entry.translation: Din konto er i karantæne i #(1) minutter.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password.
entry.translation: Problem med at logge på: Ugyldigt brugernavn eller adgangskode.

entry.string: Your account has been terminated by your request or at the adminstrator's discression.
entry.translation: Din konto er lukket af dig eller administratoren.

entry.string: Your account has been marked as inactive. Contact the adminstrator with further questions.
entry.translation: Din konto er blevet markeret inaktiv. Kontakt administratoren med yderligere spørgsmål.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
entry.translation: Problem med at logge på: Ugyldigt brugernavn eller adgangskode. Din konto er sat i karantæne i #(1) minutter.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. You have tried to log in #(1) times.
entry.translation: Problem med at logge på: Ugyldigt brugernavn eller adgangskode. Du har prøvet på at logge på #(1) gange.

entry.string: Your account has not yet been activated by the site administrator
entry.translation: Din konto er endnu ikke blevet aktiveret af administratoren
